General.Name: Rami Levi
General.Description: Rami Levi Chain Stores Hashikma Marketing 2006 Ltd operates a chain of retail stores with a format of discount network in Israel. It offers food products; vegetable and fruit products; cleaning products; toiletries; housewares; cosmetics; clothing and textiles; and leisure products. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Modi'in-Maccabim-Re'ut, Israel.
